message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay around $80 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $110, but I really think you'll love this product and get a lot of value out of it.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice. However, $110 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. How about we meet in the middle at $95?
I'm not quite willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. I think the product is worth more than $95 to me, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we try $105?
